author: Jim Christie
title: Woodbridge investors fail to speed up fight over bankruptcy plan
text:
Investors in an affiliate of the Woodbridge Group of Companies LLC have lost a bid to speed up the companyâ€™s bankruptcy case and possibly clear the way for their own plan of reorganization for the developer, which was at the center of a Ponzi scheme.
The group holds notes issued by a Woodbridge affiliate, which used their money to purchase the famed Owlwood estate in Los Angeles, once home to Cher.
